LanguageData.SW_AlertPulseIntensityDesc: Adjust the slider to either increase or decrease the intensity (brightness, alpha channel) of the alert wall pulse effect.
LanguageData.SW_AlertPulseIntervalDesc: Adjust the slider to either increase or decrease the interval (time between pulses) of the alert wall pulse effect.
LanguageData.SW_SyncPulseAlertDesc: Turning this off will ensure the individual wall sections pulse at their own timing intervals.
